badge.description: Badge text to display next to the title

barHeight.description: Height of the bar in pixels (default: 16)

data.description: Array of data items to visualize in the stacked bar

height.description: Height of the chart in pixels

showLegendValues.description: Show values in the custom legend

title.description: Title to display above the chart

useCustomLegend.description: Use custom SDS Legend component instead of ECharts built-in legend

width.description: Width of the chart in pixels
